alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 03 at 6:16AM EDT until April 07 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Wilcox, Dodge and Telfair Counties. Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville affecting Pulaski and Bleckley Counties. Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Wheeler, Treutlen and Montgomery Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Abbeville, Hawkinsville... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Oconee River Basin...including Mount Vernon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at Abbeville. * WHEN...Until late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Flooding of farm lands...timberlands...and access roads will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EDT Monday the stage was 15.7 feet and slowly falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.8 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
